user.title: Select Flic 2 button
user.description: Select the Flic 2 button you want to set up.

confirm_pair.title: Pair with {name}
confirm_pair.description: Hold the Flic button for 8 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly, then click Submit to pair.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-pair with {name}
reauth_confirm.description: The button pairing was lost. Hold the Flic button for 8 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly, then click Submit to re-pair.

error.pairing_timeout: Pairing timed out. Ensure the button is in pairing mode (hold for 8 seconds until LED blinks rapidly).
error.pairing_failed: Pairing failed. Try again and ensure you are within range of the button.
error.not_in_pairing_mode: Button is not in pairing mode. Hold the button for 8 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly (blue/red alternating), then try again.
error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the device. Ensure it is within range and try again.

abort.no_devices_found: No Flic 2 buttons found nearby. Make sure your button is awake (press it once).
